name: Sleepwalker
overview: Sleepwalker is an exciting, fast-paced game for the Atari 400/800 with 24K and one joystick, In Sleepwalker you must maneuver your sleepwalker. Fred, to avoid the refrigerators which come at you in an incessant stream, hit the stegosaurus sandwiches and drink the bottles of cactus juice to stay alive in this bizarre game. So get set and good luck!!
